metadata.title: CVE-2023-1232 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Insufficient policy enforcement in Resource Timing in Google Chrome priorto 111.0.5563.64 allowed a remote attacker to obtain potentially sensitiveinformation from API via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity:Low)

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-1232` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 111.0.5563.64-0ubuntu0.18.04.5
chromium-browser-l10n - 111.0.5563.64-0ubuntu0.18.04.5
chromium-chromedriver - 111.0.5563.64-0ubuntu0.18.04.5
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 111.0.5563.64-0ubuntu0.18.04.5
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 111.0.5563.64-0ubuntu0.18.04.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '111.0.5563.64-0ubuntu0.18.04.5').
